query:
SELECT u.name as user_name, g.id as gestor_id, l.id as loja_id, l.nome as loja_nome, l.numeroLoja 
FROM users u 
JOIN gestores g ON g.userId = u.id 
JOIN gestor_lojas gl ON gl.gestorId = g.id 
JOIN lojas l ON l.id = gl.lojaId 
WHERE u.name LIKE '%Fábio%' OR u.name LIKE '%Fabio%'
ORDER BY l.nome;
command:

JOIN lojas l ON l.id = gl.lojaId
